stu_tags: AMAZING LECTURES  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  CARING
comments: Prof. Gleason was amazing. He easily has one of the best classes I have ever come across. His dedication is unparalleled. He also gives excellent feedback in regards to Individual Projects. He also makes himself available 7 days a week and calls back/answers emails in a timely fashion. Absolutely recommend!

tag_professor: Caring (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Very clear directions and direct feedback. If you follow directions and apply yourself you cant go wrong!

tag_professor: Caring (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Instructor did a great job with the Live Chats. Beyond that no direct feedback in regards to the work turned in was provided and the feedback offered was generalize to past experiences. Also refuses to grade about a 94% on an assignment because he feels that you will never continue to learn if you get 100%.

tag_professor: Caring (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: English courses were my greatest fear. I am so thankful Prof. Gleason was my first english teacher. He taught me how to write papers and use these skills in other areas of my life. Peers have noticed the positive change when reading reports and documents I have created. He is also avaiable to help anytime and genuinely wants to help you succeed.

tag_professor: Caring (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: THE BEST TEACHER AT CTU ONLINE PERIOD. i am almost done with my BSBA so it has been a while since i have had him for a teacher, but his lessons stick with me to the day. he has prepared me for classes at higher levels, and is truely concerned about the students, and their performance. i will stop here , because 350 characters is just not enough.

tag_professor: Caring (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Great interaction with students. You do need to ask a lot of questions to get the point, but if you read the material and watch the class material video - you will be in good shape.

tag_professor: Caring (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: .He does a good job on presentation in live chats. However, you?re on your own figuring out the DB and IP. So if you?re able to interpret the task list you do well. If you do not understand the innuendoes you will not do well in his class.
